trends: there have been no other sightings in acton \ littleton line
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsat app. 2pm 7\31\11 i was traveling west bound on route 2 at the acton \ littleton line. it was a sunny day with mid level fair weather clouds. as i came around the curve, and up a slight rise, i saw a reflective black tube shaped object traveling in a easterly direction. i believe it was about 30 feet long and 6 feet in diameter. the object was tumbling end over end. the object was 2-300 feet high. as i drove under it, i remembered i had my camera in the car. i stopped in the area of the newtown road exit, and got out with my camera. the object was now at an altitude of 1000-1500 feet, still traveling east. i used a 35 mm pentax k1000 with asa 200 film with a 35-80 zoom lens at 80, focus at infinity. two pictures are attached i realized the object was traveling to fast to catch up to on the highway. i checked my watch and continued to my destination. i mailed the film for development the next day. i had a digital copy made as well as film and photo.
